# Build options for SLC-29 compliance

It is possible to perform a SLC-29 compliant build with Piper.
Check the [SLC-29 Wiki](https://wiki.wdf.sap.corp/wiki/display/pssl/SLC-29) for official information about this option.

The following build options are available:

* [Piper native build](native.md)
* [Build using xMake](xMake.md)
